data.title: YouTube Creators Spin Up AI Videos to Keep Babies Glued to the Screen
data.description: Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Alexandra S. Levine follows her report on the growing use of AI videos on YouTube aimed at children younger than 2 years old.
data.keywords: Youtube,Artificial Intelligence,Design,Chief Executive Officer,MICROSOFT CORP,Mike Robb,Startups,iPhone,Alan L Dye,Hardware,technology,business,fully-charged
